name: Lights Out! (Carlos Ivan Cordoba Quintana)
description:
A couple  lost in a  inmensurable darkness.

The goal is to help this couple to get out of this darkness.

You will die a lot, you will have to play together to make it out.

Great music, great art.

Okay game design.

A lot of soul and tears in the development.

Art :

https://bigbuckbunny.itch.io/game-boy-platform-assets
